# Spam Mail Relay Hosts and Subnets
# Sometimes spammers are using entire subnets to send spam.
# May contain false positives, or mail relays that you or your mailing users might want to receive (Not my case :)
# Saw drastic spam reduction by blocklisting and or high scoring mail from this IPs/Subnets.
# This list is maintained out of pure annoyance against spam mail.

# Example SpamAssasin Rule:

header RULE_NAME Received=~ /\[spammyIP\]/
score RULE_NAME 99
describe RULE_NAME Ban relay from serverIPaddr

# Example pf.conf ban (my favorite::)
table <spammers> persist file "/etc/spammers"
block quick from <spammers>

45.67.233.5
